about.title: About me
paragraphs: I answer to Romario, I'm 19 years old and I'm curretly pursuing a bachelor's degree in Science and Technology at UFABC, a multidisciplinar course based on many knowledge fields, such as computer science, engineering, mathematics and many others.

Due to my interest in technology, I began to study programming while in high school, since then I've learned various technologies and concepts, as well as I've built projects to practice my skills and show what I'm capable of achieving.
